title: Server Settings Guide
subtitle: Complete administrator guide for server configuration and management
adminWarning: Administrator Only - All commands on this page require Administrator or Manage Server permissions. Regular members cannot access these settings.

languageSettings.description: Change server language for bot responses
languageSettings.usage: Set the preferred language for all bot messages and interactions
examples: wset lang vi - Set language to Vietnamese
wset lang en - Set language to English
notes: Changes apply to all bot responses server-wide
Only server administrators can change this setting

prefixSettings.description: Change the bot command prefix for this server
prefixSettings.usage: Set a custom prefix for all bot commands
examples: wset prefix ! - Change prefix to exclamation mark
wset prefix $ - Change prefix to dollar sign
wset prefix . - Change prefix to dot
importantNotes: After changing prefix, members can check it with: wcheck prefix
Once changed, the default prefix (w) will no longer work
If you forget your custom prefix, use slash command: /set prefix [character] to reset
Prefix must be a single character
Avoid using special characters that might conflict with other bots

voiceSettings.usage: Toggle notifications for voice channel activities
examples: wset voice true - Enable voice notifications
wset voice false - Disable voice notifications

embedSettings.usage: Switch between embed and plain text notifications
examples: wset embed true - Enable embed notifications
wset embed false - Disable embed notifications

streakSettings.description: Enable/disable streak tracking for the entire server
examples: wset streak on - Enable streak system
wset streak off - Disable streak system

learnMore.text: Visit the streak details page for in-depth information

userLimitations: Regular members CANNOT use these settings commands
Commands will return permission denied for non-admins
Some features may require specific bot permissions
botRequirements: Manage Channels permission for notification setup
Embed Links permission for rich notifications
View Channels permission for voice tracking
